MemoryInfobox.description: 'Discovering that Eagle Bearer (imposter)|someone impersonating her had sent Piracy|pirates sailing to Alponos's shores, Kassandra committed to stopping them and undoing the damage this other "Eagle Bearer" had caused.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey – The Lost Tales of Greece'

General_Description: '''Righting a Wrong''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra met with [[Megakles]] to discover [[Eagle Bearer (imposter)|someone]] has been using her name to scam people.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra reached a beacon on the cape jutting out from [[Alponos]] and heard a general shout out to her.

*'''Megakles:''' ''You there! Come here.''

She approached the general and heard what he had to say.

*'''Kassandra:''' ''What is it?''
*'''Megakles:''' ''Some ''merc'' calling himself "The [[Eagle]] Bearer" came to Alponos offering to help out. Nice kid, and I've heard his name before. I thought to myself, "Megakles, that's [[drachma]]e well spent."''
<tabber>
|-|''I'm'' the Eagle Bearer.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Whoever came to Alponos lied to you. ''I'm'' the only Eagle Bearer.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''You? Impossible.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Well, I have [[Ikaros|an eagle]]. Also, I'm not a man.''
|-|Tell me who impersonated me.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I don't know who's been using my name, but you're going to tell me ''everything'' you know.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''What is there to tell? He came in, had some little [[Chikaros|bird]] with him. You know how legends go. One day he gets a bird, next he's called the Child of [[Jupiter|Zeus]].''
*'''Kassandra:''' She''. And I do have an eagle.''
</tabber>

*'''Megakles:''' ''I see that now, don't I? But I paid this other Eagle Bearer a small fortune to get the [[Civilian|villagers]] ready for a [[Piracy|pirate]] invasion.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''By the look on your face, I'm guessing that didn't work out.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''It didn't. Then I sent him to bargain peace, but he botched that, too. The pirates are coming, and we don't stand a chance.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Next time, hire the real Eagle Bearer. But I'm listening. Does the village of Alponos have a militia?''
*'''Megakles:''' ''Not enough. But if you get out there and stop the pirates before they land, I'll give you all that's left in the treasury.''

(Accept – "I'll fix this pirate problem.")

*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll stop the pirates from reaching your shore. Then you're going to help me find this "Eagle Bearer" impostor.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''I'll help you kill him myself.''

(If "Where are the pirate [[ship]]s?" is chosen.)

*'''Kassandra:''' ''Where are the pirates sailing from?''
*'''Megakles:''' ''We saw the pirate fleet forming north of here.''

(If "How many pirates are there?" is chosen.)

*'''Kassandra:''' ''How big is their fleet?''
*'''Megakles:''' ''Just two ships, but they may have hundreds aboard. They make it to us, we're dead.''

(If "When did the "Eagle Bearer" get here?" is chosen.)

*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm going to find the one using my name. When did you last see him?''
*'''Megakles:''' ''He came in with the last [[merchant]] ships... But I haven't seen him in days. He won't be easy to find, but if you sink the pirates, I'll track him down.''

(Leave – "I'll set sail.")

*'''Kassandra:''' ''Time to show the pirates what the real Eagle Bearer can do.''

Kassandra took the ''[[Adrestia]]'' out of port and sailed north outside [[Pandora]]'s [[Pandora's Cove|Cove]], where she spied two ships flying pirate colors.  She engaged the first one and sank it, shouting with glee.

*'''Kassandra:''' ''Hope you can swim, pirate scum! That's how the ''real'' Eagle Bearer deals with pirates!''

The ''Adrestia'' sank the second one.

*'''Kassandra:''' ''That's the last one, crew! Let's go get paid.''

Kassandra returned to Alponos to collect her pay, but Megakles was instead furious.
*'''Megakles:''' ''What were you thinking?! We're doomed!''

She approached him.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sank the pirate ships, only for Megakles to inexplicably berate her upon her return to report on her apparent success.
Section_Behind_the_scenes:
The pirate ships can spawn in the bay even without the quest being accepted. If sunk beforehand, the protagonist may utter their resultant lines while sailing near the coasts of [[Malis]] and [[Makedonia]]. The objective automatically completes as well, allowing the quest to be handed back in to Megakles immediately after accepting.

If the player is playing as [[Alexios]], the dialogue in which the protagonist corrects Megakles of the real Eagle Bearer's correct gender is omitted.
